communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All emails, including attachments, between anyone with an email address ending in “@stanford.edu”, "@MIT.edu", "@mail.utexas.edu", "@illinois.edu", or "@princeton.edu", and one or more of the following EPA officials:

Administrator Lee Zeldin
Former Acting Administrator Jane Nishida
Former Administrator Michael S. Regan
Former Administrator Andrew Wheeler
Former Administrator Scott Pruitt
Former Administrator Gina McCarthy
Former Administrator Lisa Jackson
Former Acting Administrator and Deputy Administrator  Bob Perciasepe
Former Acting Administrator Catherine McCabe

Acting Deputy Administrator Chad McIntosh
Former Acting Deputy Administrator Gregg Treml
Former Acting Deputy Administrator Dan Utech
Former Acting Deputy Administrator Jane Nishida
Former Deputy Administrator Janet McCabe
Former Acting Deputy Administrator Henry Darwin
Former Acting Deputy Administrator Mike Flynn
Former Acting Deputy Administrator Stan Meiberg
Former Acting Deputy Administrator Lisa Feldt


Chief of Staff Eric Amidon
Former Chief of Staff Dan Utech

White House Liaison John Rich
Former White House Liaison Sinceré Harris
Former White House Liaison Gabriella Cascone
Former White House Liaison Howard Ou

Principal Deputy Associate Administrator, Office of Policy Mallory Richardson
Former Associate Administrator, Office of Policy Victoria Arroyo
Former Associate Administrator, Office of Policy Brittany Bolen
Former Associate Administrator, Office of Policy Samantha Dravis
Former Associate Administrator, Office of Policy Laura Vaught
Former Associate Administrator, Office of Policy Joel Beauvais
Former Associate Administrator, Office of Policy Michael Goo

Director, Greenhouse Gas Reduction Fund David Widawsky
Former Acting Director, Greenhouse Gas Reduction Fund Jahi Wise


Please limit your search to emails sent or received between January 1, 2013 and the date the search is conducted.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Madeleine Stone
